Header.title: Lanbridge Solutions
Header.paragraph: Your one stop solution for network infrastructure services

About.paragraph: LANBridge Solutions has been established since 2002, with a proven track record and a reputation for its service excellence. We are a network solutions company that can take care of your network infrastructure needs and at the same time integrate quality services and economies of scale to benefit our clients. We have a pool of engineers, where customers will benefit from completing tight scheduled jobs and achieve quality work at the same time. We are currently serving a number of MNCs from Japan & USA, and many more SMC in Singapore. With customer satisfaction as our major goal, we believe in providing quality and real timeliness services in a cost effective manner.

Services.name: Computer Rack Systems
Services.text: Installation of open and closed, 19 and 24 inch Computer Rack Systems

Services.text: We provide industry standard floorplan diagrams for large enterprise projects

Services.name: Stable Wireless Connectivity
Services.text: We provide stable and high-speed internet connection with a wide network coverage
